name: Corporate Headquarters
overview:
Fonemine is driven by a vision and commitment to provide an enjoyable and enriching experience to every mobile device user. We are the first company to launch a next generation enterprise mobile cloud platform that enables highly interactive, unified App’s for enterprise mobility. Through our innovative platform, which consolidates information across multiple App’s and allows for increased customization, Fonemine provides clients with a more efficient and interactive mobile solution to their business needs. The Fonemine MobileForce Unified App’s Suite allows for a more engaging and interactive 2-way experience and enables businesses to rapidly go to market with innovative enterprise mobility applications to enable their sales teams, service professionals, partners, customers and employees to have the “Right Information at the Right time”.

With Fonemine, businesses can integrate their mobile offerings with their existing backends, own strategies and business needs. Through analytics, Fonemine allows enterprises to get feedback on how well their mobile strategy is functioning.

We recognize that the mobile device is not just an extension of the Internet, but an important tool for communication and consumer outreach. As such, Fonemine was created to offer our customers the ability to choose any starting point for their mobile strategy and develop and evolve their services easily in real time. Now, businesses don’t need to worry about silo-ed approaches, cross device support, infrastructure requirements, and mobile user diversity
